subsections.description: Enable all 4 portals to Nacht der Untoten by overriding the Corruption Engines. Each one gives power to that part of the map. You only have to survive a short time, and no killing is required.

pic.alt: Location 1 - The House
Location 2 - Mob of the Dead
Location 3 - Verrückt
Location 4 - Der Eisendrache
Sign showing all regions powered

subsections.description: All 4 regions of the map must have power first. Trap the Apothicon by firing the Tesla Death Ray upstairs in Nacht der Untoten. Then, shoot the 3 yellow guts around the stomach of the Apothicon.

pic.alt: Portal to Nacht der Untoten
Flashing light to interact when the Apothicon flies by
Entrance to Apothicon
One of the 3 guts to shoot
Pack-a-Punch machine
Exit the Apothicon to Mob of the Dead, Verrückt, Der Eisendrache, or The House (gateways from left to right)

subsections.description: Each player has a statue with 4 trials in Nacht der Untoten. Hover over a trial to view the requirements and interact to get the reward. Each player will see a skull with glowing eyes above their trials.

pic.alt: Trial statues

subsections.description: Stand on each of the 4 pressure plates surrounding the pyramid in Der Eisendrache until they light up blue. Once active, low gravity mode will randomly turn on and off during the game.

pic.alt: Pyramid and surrounding pressure plates
Quick Revive - in front of The House
Double Tap Root Beer - at Origins
Mule Kick - in Mob of the Dead
Speed Cola - in Verrückt
Widow's Wine - upstairs in Kino der Toten
Stamin-Up - in Shangri-La
Juggernog - in Nacht der Untoten
Der Wunderfizz location 1 - at Origins in a trench
Der Wunderfizz location 2 - at Origins on the Excavation Site
Der Wunderfizz location 3 - in Verrückt
Der Wunderfizz location 4 - between Kino der Toten and Der Eisendrache

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located at Origins (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - by the jump pad going to The House
Location 2 - on a box in the trenches
Location 3 - on a chair in the trenches

subsections.description: Located in Verrückt (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a pillar near Speed Cola
Location 2 - on a pile of chairs in the room above Speed Cola
Location 3 - on a table upstairs

subsections.description: Located in Der Eisendrache (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a wall near the pyramid
Location 2 - on a wall above the PaP location from the original map
Location 3 - on a wall going right from the Corruption Engine

subsections.description: Build at the workbench in Nacht der Untoten.

pic.alt: Workbench location

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and build the Summoning Altar. Summon the Keeper Protector for 5000 points.

subsections.description: Located in Verrückt (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a shelf near Speed Cola
Location 2 - up the stairs from the Corruption Engine, on a wheelchair
Location 3 - near the jump pad to Mob of the Dead, on a wheelchair

subsections.description: Located near Der Eisendrache or Kino der Toten (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - next to the pyramid in Der Eisendrache
Location 2 - on a barrel in a small side room from Der Eisendrache
Location 3 - on a table near the jump pad in Kino der Toten

subsections.description: Located near Origins or Mob of the Dead (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - across from Double Tap at Origins
Location 2 - on top of the Excavation Site at Origins
Location 3 - in the Cafeteria at Mob of the Dead

subsections.header: Build at 1 of the 4 Summoning Altar Locations
subsections.description: The Keeper Protector can be summmoned at any location after building it anywhere.

pic.alt: Location 1 - at Origins
Location 2 - upstairs in Verrückt
Location 3 - on the Stage in Kino der Toten
Location 4 - in a small side room from Der Eisendrache

sections.description: You must first obtain the Apothicon Servant (Estulla Astoth) from the Mystery Box. After these steps, you can upgrade it in the Pack-a-Punch machine.

subsections.description: Shoot 5 floating blue rocks with the Apothicon Servant. After being shot, the rock will disappear.

pic.alt: Location 1 - by the Corruption Engine at Mob of the Dead, facing the blue sun
Location 2 - by the jump pad in Verrückt coming from Mob of the Dead, facing the blue sun
Location 3 - by the Corruption Engine at Verrückt, to the right of the portal
Location 4 - by the Corruption Engine at Der Eisendrache, facing away from the portal
Location 5 - upstairs in Nacht der Untoten, facing towards The House

subsections.description: The Apothicon Servant can now be upgraded with the Pack-a-Punch machine as normal.

pic.alt: Estoom-oth

sections.description: Each player can equip only one at a time, and each one gives different abilities.

subsections.description: +1 hit from zombies, sprint duration increased, 50% more damage against all enemies, 33% damage reduction from all enemies

step.title: 1. Get kills in the green mist inside the Apothicon
step.description: The kills must be inside the green pool in the Apothicon and during the green mist. You must kill 50 zombies, 15 parasites, 15 spiders, 10 Furies, 5 Keepers, and 3 Margwas. At least 2 different types of Margwas must be killed.

pic.alt: Zombies in the green pool with green mist
Parasite
Spider
Fury
Keeper
Normal Margwa

step.title: 2. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Apothicon Mask on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Apothicon Mask

subsections.description: 50% damage reduction from all Boss attacks, 33% more damage to Bosses, no damage from elemental zombies' death effects, sprint duration increased

step.title: 1. Kill 50 zombies with traps
step.description: A sound will play after you get enough trap kills.

pic.alt: The electric trap in Verrückt

step.title: 2. Destroy a Panzer's face shield and power core
step.description: This does not have to be done to the same Panzer. Keep shooting the power core after destroying it until the audio cue is played.

pic.alt: Panzer with broken power core
Panzer with broken face shield

step.title: 3. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Knight Helmet on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Knight Helmet

subsections.description: +1 hit from zombies, 50% damage reduction from keepers, 33% more damage to keepers, Keeper Protector lasts 30 seconds longer

step.title: 1. Use the Keeper Protector to kill 30 zombies
step.description: The kills will count over multiple uses of the Keeper Protector and when called from different players.

pic.alt: The Keeper Protector about to kill a zombie

step.title: 2. Use a Corruption Turret to kill 30 zombies
step.description: This step is not needed if you already have unlocked the Wolf Mask.

pic.alt: Using the Corruption Turret in Der Eisendrache

step.title: 3. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Keeper Mask on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Keeper Mask

subsections.description: 33% damage reduction from fury melee attacks, 50% more damage to Furies, +1 hit from zombies

step.title: 1. Get 15 Fury headshot kills
step.description: A sound will play after you get enough headshot kills

pic.alt: Aiming at a Fury's head

step.title: 2. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Fury Mask on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Fury Mask

subsections.description: +1 hit from zombies

step.title: 1. Shoot 935 on the Der Eisendrache clock
step.description: Using a bullet gun, shoot IX, III, then V on the clock tower.

pic.alt: Clock location, just outside the portal and looking up

step.title: 2. Get headshot kills near 4 sparking urns
step.description: Zombie souls will fly to the urn if it was killed within range and the kill was from a headshot. After enough souls, a sound will play. Once all 4 are filled, the hat will be unlocked.

pic.alt: Location 1 - Der Eisendrache
Location 2 - projector room in Kino der Toten
Location 3 - Verrückt
Location 4 - Origins

step.title: 3. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Viking Helmet on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Viking Helmet

subsections.description: 50% damage reduction from all Margwa attacks, 33% more damage to Margwa heads, sprint duration increased

step.title: 1. Kill a fire or normal Margwa with a sniper
step.description: Void Margwas do not count.

pic.alt: Fire Margwa being killed by a sniper

step.title: 2. Kill a void Margwa
step.description: Any weapon can be used.

pic.alt: Void Margwa

step.title: 3. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Margwa Mask on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Margwa Mask

subsections.description: Sprint duration increased

step.title: 1. Throw a grenade in the Wolf King crypt
step.description: Go to Der Eisendrache and throw a grenade into a hole in the wall containing a coffin. A wolf skull will fall out and land on the ground.

pic.alt: Location to throw grenade
Wolf skull on the ground

step.title: 2. Kill 15 zombies in low gravity
step.description: When low gravity mode is on, the wolf skull will float and spin around. Kill zombies close enough such that their souls fly into the skull. After enough kills, the skull will disappear and the mask will be unlocked.

pic.alt: Floating skull

step.title: 3. Equip
step.description: All players can now equip the Wolf Mask on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Mannequin with Wolf Mask

subsections.description: Found in a cell in Mob of the Dead.

pic.alt: Location to get Al's hat

sections.header: Main Quest (For the Good of All)
sections.description: Doing the quest after the 4 previous Black Ops III quests are done will grant the super easter egg, A Better Tomorrow.

subsections.description: There are 4 graves outside The House with the names Takeo Masaki, Edward Richtofen, Tank Dempsey, and Nikolai Belinski. Shoot them in the order Richtofen, Dempsey, Takeo, Nikolai (2, 3, 1, 4). A flame will appear when done correctly.

pic.alt: Takeo and Richtofen's graves, by a barrier to the right of Quick Revive
Dempsey and Nikolai's graves, by the jump pad going to Origins
Flames after shooting the final grave

subsections.description: The Keeper Protector is required for this step.

step.title: Find the jump pad with the rock
step.description: One of the jump pads will have a small pointed rock coming out of the ground, just behind the glowing circle.

pic.alt: Rock on the jump pad

step.title: Bring the Keeper Protector to the rock
step.description: When the Keeper Protector gets close enough, it will begin a ritual and must be protected for 3 minutes. If the ritual doesn't start right away, try using the jump pad, coming back, and standing in the far back of the jump pad. If the ritual finishes successfully, the rock will be gone.

pic.alt: Keeper Protector doing the ritual

step.title: Play the reel
step.description: After the ritual, a reel will be on the ground in front of the jump pad. Pick it up, then place it on the audio device on the top floor of Nacht der Untoten.

pic.alt: Reel on the ground
Audio device in Nacht der Untoten

step.title: Throw Li'l Arnies into 3 sets of 3 spawn holes
step.description: There are 9 zombie spawn holes inside the Apothicon. You must throw a Li'l Arnie into 3 holes at a time until you've thrown 1 into each of the 9 holes. Every time you complete a set of 3 holes, 3 Margwas will spawn. The order does not matter, but if you throw a Li'l Arnie into the same hole twice, you have to redo all 9.

pic.alt: Spawn hole 1
Spawn hole 2
Spawn hole 3
Spawn hole 4
Spawn hole 5
Spawn hole 6
Spawn hole 7
Spawn hole 8
Spawn hole 9
Crouching a little away from the hole so it doesn't miss

step.title: Play the reel
step.description: After all the Margwas are killed, a reel will be on the ground on the lower bridge in the Apothicon. Pick it up, then place it on the audio device on the Stage in Kino der Toten.

pic.alt: Reel on the ground
Audio device in Kino der Toten

subsections.description: The upgraded Apothicon Servant (Estoom-oth) and a Pack-a-Punched weapon are both required for this step.

step.title: Collect bones
step.description: There are 6 bones inside rocks around the map. For each bone, shoot the rock with a PaP weapon to reveal the bone. Then, shoot it with the upgraded Apothicon Servant to teleport the bone. These can be collected in any order.

pic.alt: Location 1 - by the Corruption Engine at The House, looking into a broken church
Location 2 - outside the map at Origins, near the Keeper Protector altar
Location 3 - by the Corruption Engine at Verrückt, on a larger rock by a waterfall
Location 4 - on the wallrun at Der Eisendrache (on the bottom half of the curved section near the start, it's one of the bricks sticking out the furthest)
Where to aim to collect the bone at Der Eisendrache
Location 5 - above Stamin-Up at Shangri-La
Location 6 - on the upper roof of Nacht der Untoten

step.title: Assemble the skeleton
step.description: On the top floor of Nacht der Untoten, shoot the pile of bones with the upgraded Apothicon Servant. Sophia's zombie corpse will appear on the ground where the bones used to be. Shoot the corpse with the Apothicon Servant.

pic.alt: The bone pile
Zombie Sophia

step.title: Play the reel
step.description: After Sophia's corpse is teleported away, a reel will be in its place. Pick it up, then place it on the audio device on the Excavation Site at Origins.

pic.alt: Reel on the ground
Audio device on the Excavation Site at Origins

subsections.description: Each of the 4 Corruption Turrets must be pointed at 4 specific blue crystals in the sky. When done correctly, you will be kicked out of the turret and the laser will remain going towards Nacht der Untoten.

pic.alt: Where to aim Corruption Turret at The House
Where to aim Corruption Turret at Mob of the Dead
Where to aim Corruption Turret at Verrückt
Where to aim Corruption Turret at Der Eisendrache

subsections.header: 6. Bring Sophia to Kino der Toten
subsections.description: With all 4 lasers pointing to Sophia's ghost in Nacht der Untoten, interact to materialize it, then follow it to Kino der Toten until it lands on the teleporter.

pic.alt: Location to interact on Sophia's ghost
Following Sophia to Kino der Toten

subsections.description: Before teleporting, you can optionally do the Wisp Super Easter Egg step now. With all players in the teleporter on the Stage in Kino der Toten, interact to teleport to Samantha's room. In Samantha's room, pick up the Kronorium from the bed. You can teleport again on the next round if you failed to pick up the book in time.

pic.alt: The teleporter
The Kronorium

subsections.description: Interact on the podium in Kino der Toten to place the Kronorium.

pic.alt: Souls flying out of the Kronorium after placing it on the podium

subsections.description: A purple sigil will be in the projector room of Kino der Toten, and it requires 4 runes to be complete. This step must be completed 4 times, one for each rune, but multiple players can work on different runes at the same time. Each player can only hold one egg or one Gateworm at a time.

pic.alt: The sigil

step.title: Find a yellow egg
step.description: There are over 20 potential egg locations around the map, and 4 eggs will spawn at the same time as the purple sigil appeared. Interact to pick it up. The following locations are only some of the possibilities. Find more

pic.alt: Possible egg location - at The House, on a barrel by the jump pad to Origins
Possible egg location - at Origins, near the Keeper Protector altar
Possible egg location - in Verrückt, near the jump pad going to Mob of the Dead
Possible egg location - in Verrückt, in the corner of the room above Speed Cola
Possible egg location - in Kino der Toten, by some seats above the stairs that go down towards the Stage
Possible egg location - at Der Eisendrache, in the statue room
Possible egg location - at Shangri-La, in the fire below the temple stairs

step.title: Incubate the egg
step.description: Place the egg in one of the 4 corners of the green pool in the Apothicon. Then, kill zombies to collect souls until the egg hatches. Pick up the Gateworm.

pic.alt: One of the 4 incubators to place the egg
Gateworm to pick up

step.title: Find the rune
step.description: Go around the map until you hear a sonar pinging sound. It has a very short range, but will ping faster as you get closer. Interact where the pinging gets the fastest to place the Gateworm. A rune will appear that must be interacted. The following locations are only some of the possibilities.

pic.alt: Possible rune location - at The House, to the left of Quick Revive
Possible rune location - outside The House, next to the jump pad going to Origins
Possible rune location - in Mob of the Dead, all the way across from the Corruption Engine
Possible rune location - in Verrückt, by the green vats from Zetsubou No Shima
Possible rune location - in Verrückt, upstairs by the trap
Possible rune location - at Der Eisendrache, on a pressure plate
Possible rune location - at Shangri-La, on the pressure plate by Stamin-Up

step.title: Repeat
step.description: Repeat until all 4 runes have been aquired. They can be seen in the HUD as the Runes of Creation. The runes on the sigil will glow after they are aquired. Do not stand on the sigil until you're ready for the next step.

pic.alt: The sigil with all runes collected

step.title: Teleport to the arena
step.description: All players must stand on the purple sigil to teleport to the boss arena (one player on each of the runes). After teleporting, you have a short timer to start the fight, and if you run out of time or enter the runes incorrectly, you will teleport out of the arena. After starting the next round, you will be able to stand on the sigil and try again.

pic.alt: Standing on the sigil to teleport

step.title: Start the fight
step.description: Moving quickly, interact on the Kronorium and remember the order of the 4 runes. The book will flip through pages and briefly show the 4 runes in a random order. Still moving quickly, run up to the entrance to the arena and interact on the changing rune in the same order that the runes appeared in the book. Each of the 4 runes will appear exactly once in the correct sequence, but the cycling rune will show repeated runes and unused runes. Numbering them 1-4 as they appear in the HUD can help remember the correct runes in the correct order.

pic.alt: The Kronorium
One of the runes being shown in the book
The cycling rune to interact with
All 4 runes entered correctly (for this specific game)
The rune order in the HUD

step.title: Elemental waves
step.description: The fight consists of 4 elemental waves that will appear in a random order. In each wave, you must survive and kill Margwas until the wave ends. Max Ammo power-ups will spawn by the Kronorium throughout the fight. In the fire wave, dodge the fire and lava that move around the arena. In the wave with the white circles and red floor, you must stand within the circles at all times to avoid damage. In the lightning wave, avoid the moving walls and lightning on the floor. In the void wave, dodge the moving pillars.

pic.alt: Fire wave
White circle wave
Lightning wave
Void wave

step.title: Grab the Summoning Key
step.description: After all 4 waves are over, the Summoning Key will lower to the center of the arena. One player must interact to pick it up, and will then hold the Summoning Key in place of their weapon (without losing any weapons). All players will teleport out of the arena.

pic.alt: Summoning Key

subsections.description: The player holding the Summoning Key must throw it at 7 objects around the map. Each time it's thrown, it can be picked up by any player. The objects will glow white when collected, and they can be collected in any order. When all 7 are collected, the Summoning Key will go away.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in Kino der Toten, on the main chandelier
Location 2 - in Der Eisendrache, on the clock tower
Location 3 - at Shangri-La, a blue sphere to the right of the staircase after coming from Der Eisendrache
Location 4 - in Mob of the Dead, in a cell on the second level
Location 5 - at Verrückt, on the MG42 looking right from the Corruption Engine
Location 6 - at Origins, on a grave seen from the Excavation Site
Location 7 - in Nacht der Untoten, on a red barrel outside a barrier on the bottom floor

subsections.description: After teleporting, you won't be able to come back, even after finishing the main quest.

step.title: Teleport to the arena
step.description: The teleporter in Kino der Toten will be powered after all 7 objects are collected with the Summoning Key. With all players inside, interact to teleport.

pic.alt: The teleporter

step.title: Damaging the Shadowman
step.description: The Shadowman cannot be damaged while he has a shield. Interact on one of the 4 pedestals that glow green in order to place the Summoning Key. After killing enough zombies near the Summoning Key, it will have enough souls and can be interacted to pick it up. Throw it at Sohpia's ghost to disable the Shadowman's shield.

pic.alt: One of the pedestals for the Summoning Key
Throwing the Summoning Key at Sophia's ghost
The Shadowman without a shield

step.title: Trapping the Shadowman
step.description: When his shield is disabled, you can shoot the Shadowman to deal damage. The Shadowman will teleport around as he takes damage, and he slowly moves backwards towards the Apothicon. If his shield comes back, use another pedestal to charge the Summoning Key and throw it at Sophia again. After enough damage, the Shadowman will teleport back all the way to the Apothicon's mouth. As soon as this happens, interact on the Kronorium to end the fight (you may not need to use all 4 pedestals if you deal damage fast enough). This will end the game and grant the achievement for all players.

pic.alt: The Shadowman in the Apothicon's mouth
Ending the fight by interacting on the Kronorium

subsections.description: Interact with 3 teddy bears.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the entrance to Mob of the Dead from the Excavation Site
Location 2 - in Verrückt, near the jump pad to Mob of the Dead
Location 3 - in a chair in Kino der Toten

subsections.description: Complete the wallrun outside of Der Eisendrache to get a free perk bottle. This will grant a random perk for all players. If you fall outside of the map, you will be teleported safely back without dying.

pic.alt: Start of wallrun
Floating perk bottle

subsections.description: Unlock a way to trade weapons between players, and also a wall-buy for the M1927.

step.title: 1. Get the chalk stick
step.description: The pink chalk is located on a wall in Der Eisendrache. Wallrun over it and interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: The chalk

step.title: 2. Rearrange the chalk writings
step.description: Interact on a chalk writing to pick it up, then interact on another wall to place it. Interacting in the following order will place all chalk writings correctly.

pic.alt: Location 1 - spiral stairs in Nacht der Untoten (pick up "SALVATION LIES ABOVE")
Location 2 - other staircase in Nacht der Untoten (place "SALVATION LIES ABOVE")
Location 3 - wall in Mob of the Dead (pick up "KNOWLEDGE ITSELF IS FOR THE TAKING")
Location 4 - Kino der Toten, to the right of where the power switch was in the original (swap "A SOUL ALONE CAN FOLLOW THE PATH" for "KNOWLEDGE ITSELF IS FOR THE TAKING")
Location 5 - same wall in Mob of the Dead (place "A SOUL ALONE CAN FOLLOW THE PATH")
Location 6 - Der Eisendrache, below where the dragon head was in the Undercroft in the original (pick up "WISH TOO OFTEN AND YOUR WISHING WELL WILL RUN")
Location 7 - Verrückt, on a floor upstairs (swap "YOU MUST ASCEND FROM DARKNESS" for "WISH TOO OFTEN AND YOUR WISHING WELL WILL RUN")
Location 8 - spiral staircase in Nacht der Untoten again (place "YOU MUST ASCEND FROM DARKNESS")

step.title: Rewards
step.description: After completing the steps, an M1927 wall-buy will be available in Der Eisendrache. The trading table in Nacht der Untoten is unlocked too. Interact on the table to place or pick up a gun.

pic.alt: M1927 wall-buy
Weapon trading table

subsections.description: After getting 100 kills with Li'l Arnies, throw a Li'l Arnie into the window of the church outside The House. This will refill your Li'l Arnies with the upgraded version, and will upgrade them for all players.

pic.alt: The window to throw the Li'l Arnie
A purple upgraded Li'l Arnie

subsections.description: Complete rounds under a certain time to unlock melee weapons. Purchase between Shangri-La and Der Eisendrache.

pic.alt: Nunchucks - 5 rounds under 5 minutes
Skull Splitter - 10 rounds under 12 minutes
Buzz Cut - 15 rounds under 19 minutes
Nightbreaker - 20 rounds under 32 minutes

subsections.description: Unlocks the Path of Sorrows melee weapon and turns all wall-buys and Mystery Box weapons into Pack-a-Punch weapons. At least one player in the lobby must have the Summoning Key and 4 Gateworms from the other main quests in Black Ops III.

step.title: 1. Complete the main quest steps up until teleporting to Samantha's room
step.description: Make sure you don't pick up the wisp until you're ready to teleport.

pic.alt: Teleporter ready to go

step.title: 2. Carry the wisp to the teleporter
step.description: Interact on the wisp on a truck outside The House to pick it up. If you take damage, the wisp will be lost forever. Bring it to the teleporter and teleport to Samantha's room.

pic.alt: The wisp on a headlight

step.title: 3. Interact on the "Mystery Box" in Samantha's room

pic.alt: Location to interact

step.title: Rewards
step.description: The Path of Sorrows can be purchased on the Time Attack board in Shangri-La. For the rest of the game, all weapons purchased from wall-buys or the Mystery Box will be Pack-a-Punched.
